item.description:
A party just for singles. Bring your friends. I'll be available to type people, answer your Enneagram or other typing system questions for Myers-Briggs, Personal Thinking Patterns or Astrology.

I plan on having name tags with people types on them so you can ask questions to each other about your similarities and differences. Who knows? Usually deep conversations abound. Maybe you'll meet someone special.

Party from 7pm-11pm. Show up anytime.

$10

I'll provide some vegetarian snacks and dishes. It's a vegetarian potluck party so bring only vegetarian dishes or snacks if you want to bring something, though it's not a requirement to bring anything but yourself. Bring drinks if you want, including wine.

Herb Pearce
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
www.meetup.com/The-Arlington-Singles-Events
www.meetup.com/Enneagram-Group
item.name: Singles Enneagram Party
